mapper.insert: insert into USER(ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT UID as uid, ID as id, NAME as name, EMAIL as email, PHONE as phone FROM USER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into DAYCARE_REVIEW(DAYCARE_ID, RATING, DATE, CONTENT, UID) values(#{daycareId}, #{rating}, #{date}, #{content}, #{uid})
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_ID, RATING, DATE, CONTENT, UID FROM DAYCARE_REVIEW WHERE DAYCARE_ID = #{daycareId}
